title: tspan
shortDescriptionOfTheTag: The tspan element allows to group a part of a text within a text element.

usageExamples.title: Basic tspan Example
usageExamples.description: This example shows the usage of the tspan tag to style a part of a text.
usageExamples.code: <text x='10' y='20'>This is a <tspan fill='red'>red</tspan> word</text>

usageExamples.title: Nested tspan Example
usageExamples.description: This example shows nested tspan tags to apply different styles to different parts of the text.
usageExamples.code: <text x='10' y='20'>This is a <tspan fill='red'>red <tspan fill='blue'>blue</tspan></tspan> word</text>
usageExamples.layoutsCode:
/text @x={10} @y={20}
	This is a 
	/tspan @fill="red"
		red 
		/tspan @fill="blue"
			blue
	 word
